SELECT a.aprv_no aprvNo, a.user_id userId, a.doc_cat_cd docCatCd, c1.code_nm codeName, a.aprv_title aprvTitle, a.aprv_contents aprvContents, a.aprv_ymd aprvYmd, a.rjct_reason rjctReason, a.aprv_stat_cd aprvStatCd, c2.code_nm statName, a.reference, a.c_date cDate, af.orgin_filename orginFilename, af.save_filename saveFilename, al.aprv_stat_cd aprvStatCd, al.aprv_ymd aprv_line_ymd, al.user_id alUserId, u.user_nm userName, ul.user_nm ulUserName FROM approval a JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN approval_file af ON a.aprv_no = af.aprv_no LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON a.aprv_no = al.aprv_no LEFT JOIN user ul ON al.user_id = ul.user_id LEFT JOIN common_code c1 ON a.doc_cat_cd = c1.code AND c1.group_code = 'A002' LEFT JOIN common_code c2 ON a.aprv_stat_cd = c2.code AND c2.group_code = 'A001'
WHERE a.user_id = 'admin'
WHERE al.user_id = 'admin'
WHERE a.user_id = 'admin'
WHERE (a.user_id = 'admin' OR al.user_id = 'admin' OR a.reference LIKE '%admin%')
AND c2.code = '01' AND c2.code = '01' AND c2.code = '01' AND c2.code = '02' AND c2.code = '03' AND c2.code = '04'
ORDER BY a.c_date DESC;

SELECT a.aprv_no aprvNo, a.user_id userId, a.doc_cat_cd docCatCd, a.aprv_title aprvTitle, a.aprv_contents aprvContents, a.aprv_ymd aprvYmd, a.rjct_reason rjctReason, a.aprv_stat_cd aprvStat, a.reference, a.c_date cDate, a.u_date uDate, u.user_nm userName, u.rank_cd, u.dept_cd, c1.code_nm rankName, c2.code_nm deptName, al.aprv_stat_cd lineAprvStat, al.aprv_ymd lineAprvYmd, al.aprv_sequence aprvSequence FROM approval a JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN common_code c1 ON u.rank_cd = c1.code AND c1.group_code = 'R001' LEFT JOIN common_code c2 ON u.dept_cd = c2.code AND c2.group_code = 'D001' LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON a.aprv_no = al.aprv_no WHERE a.aprv_no = #{aprvNo} ORDER BY al.aprv_sequence;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM approval INNER JOIN approval_line ON approval.aprv_no = approval_line.aprv_no WHERE approval_line.user_id = #{userId} AND approval_line.aprv_stat_cd = (SELECT CODE FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'A001' AND code_nm = '진행중')
